404.text_1: The page you're looking for isn't available.
404.text_2: Try searching again or use the Go Back button below.
404.title: You seem to be lost!

500.text_1: We're trying our best to fix it.
500.text_2: Please try again in a few minutes.
500.title: Server is down!

connection_refused:
Oops! Failed to connect to the Web Console middleware.
Please make sure a rails development server is running.

messages.already_confirmed: was already confirmed, please try signing in
messages.carrierwave_integrity_error: is not of an allowed file type
messages.confirmation_period_expired: needs to be confirmed within %{period}, please request a new one
messages.content_type_allowlist_error: You are not allowed to upload %{content_type} files, allowed types: %{allowed_types}
messages.content_type_denylist_error: You are not allowed to upload %{content_type} files
messages.expired: has expired, please request a new one
messages.extension_allowlist_error: You are not allowed to upload %{extension} files, allowed types: %{allowed_types}
messages.extension_denylist_error: You are not allowed to upload %{extension} files, prohibited types: %{prohibited_types}
messages.greater_than_or_equal_to: must be greater than or equal to %{count}
messages.inclusion: is not included in the list
messages.invalid_currency: has invalid format (must be '100', '5%{decimal}24', or '123%{thousands}456%{decimal}78'). Got %{currency}
messages.less_than_or_equal_to: must be less than or equal to %{count}
messages.max_height_error: Image height should be less than %{max_height}px
messages.max_size_error: File size should be less than %{max_size}
messages.max_width_error: Image width should be less than %{max_width}px
messages.min_height_error: Image height should be greater than %{min_height}px
messages.min_size_error: File size should be greater than %{min_size}
messages.min_width_error: Image width should be greater than %{min_width}px

not_saved.other: %{count} errors prohibited this %{resource} from being saved:

messages.processing_error: Failed to manipulate, maybe it is not an image?

wrong_length.one: is the wrong length (should be 1 character)
wrong_length.other: is the wrong length (should be %{count} characters)

template.body: There were problems with the following fields:

header.other: %{count} errors prohibited this %{model} from being saved

unacceptable_request: A supported version is expected in the Accept header.
unavailable_session:
Session %{id} is no longer available in memory.

If you happen to run on a multi-process server (like Unicorn or Puma) the process
this request hit doesn't store %{id} in memory. Consider turning the number of
processes/workers to one (1) or using a different server in development.
